alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 14 at 6:00PM MDT until September 14 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Deer Trail, or 35 miles northwest of Limon, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Deer Trail around 615 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
